name: @expreva/tsrun
description: Parse and evaluate TypeScript in a worker sandbox

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf publish/cjs/* && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --format=cjs --outfile=publish/cjs/index.js && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > publish/cjs/package.json
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf publish/esm/* && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --format=esm --outfile=publish/esm/index.js && echo '{"type": "module"}' > publish/esm/package.json
scripts.build: mkdir -p publish && npm run build:web && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
